definition: to define or delimit something, to set boundaries or limits, to distinguish or differentiate, often used in the context of clarifying or specifying a concept, idea, or position
examples: Ich m√∂chte mich von meiner Familie abgrenzen.
I want to distance myself from my family.
Es ist wichtig, klare Grenzen abzugrenzen.
It is important to define clear boundaries.
Die beiden Themen lassen sich schwer voneinander abgrenzen.
It is difficult to differentiate between the two topics.
Er versucht, sich von seinen schlechten Gewohnheiten abzugrenzen.
He is trying to separate himself from his bad habits.
